alert.note: Alert for Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 21 at 5:22PM MDT until September 22 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 10 AM CDT THURSDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 35 degrees will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Corson County. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 3 AM to 10 AM CDT Thursday. For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 7 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
